synopsis.text: Sakura Inami, Mirai Kuriyama, Mitsuki Nase, and Ai Shindou transform into adorable chibi idols, taking on the roles of judges in a whimsical courtroom. In this peculiar parallel universe, they are tasked with putting various characters from Kyoukai no Kanata on trial, revealing their eccentric habits and delivering humorous verdicts. The first defendant to face this delightful jury is Akihito Kanbara, who finds himself accused of a mysterious charge. As these charming angels preside over the court, they uncover the comedic truth behind each character's quirks, providing a fresh and entertaining perspective on the world of Kyoukai no Kanata.
